This book was written in DocBook 5 XML (unmodified)
DocBook 5: The Definitive Guide:
.
Composition of this book took place entirely in Emacs (nXML/RNG mode if you're curious), on an assortment of Fedora Linux releases.
This book was produced using an xsltproc → dblatex → xetex → xdvipdfmx toolchain.
